medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and vomiting for 3 days, evolving to abdominal pain and distention, with hematemesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago with nausea and vomiting that initially was bilious but progressed to hematemesis. The patient developed abdominal pain and distention, leading to weakness and continued emesis, prompting a visit to the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: IDDM, HTN, past right knee surgery.
